# Insta-DB
  - A small Instagram like database application run on Oracle database & interface through Python.
## Requirements
  - [![Python 3.6.5](data:image/png;base64,)](https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-365)
  - [![Oracle 11G] (https://www.dbmasters.at/i/Projects/dbmasters/bilder/logos/Oracle_Database_11g.gif)](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/database/database-technologies/express-edition/downloads/index.html)
  - [![Oracle package](https://badge.fury.io/py/cx_Oracle.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/cx_Oracle)


## Steps
  1. Create your Oracle account & workspace account
  2. Run the SQL file in Oracle 11G
  3. Open the Python file in IDLE and run it.
